column.name: TRANCODE
column.comment: Code of record from Source (D/N)

column.name: SYSTEM_IND
column.comment: System indicator

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) are), XMK ​​(Cross Market).

column.name: SUBSCRIBER_NO
column.comment: Telephone Number

column.name: BAN
column.comment: Billing Account number

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: effective change date

column.name: INIT_ACTIVATION_DATE
column.comment: A mandatory attribute, displaying the date on which the Subscriber is activated.

column.name: SUB_STATUS
column.comment: participants status

column.name: SUB_STATUS_DATE
column.comment: displaying the last date on which the Subscriber's status is changed.

column.name: SUB_STATUS_LAST_ACT
column.comment: This attribute contains the last activity performed on the Subscriber which resulted in a status modification.

column.name: SUB_STATUS_RSN_CODE
column.comment: This attribute describes the reason for the activity in the current Subscriber status.  (see Status Reason table)).

column.name: PRODUCT_TYPE
column.comment: Identifies the participant's product type (e.g. GSM).

column.name: CUSTOMER_BAN
column.comment: The ID of the BAN to which the subscriber is currently related. The attribute is populated when a new Subscriber record is opened.

column.name: CTN_SEQ_NO
column.comment: An attribute that maintains the sequential number incremented for each row of subscriber.  This field is for processes like CSM_TRANSACTION. S

column.name: REQ_ST_GRACE_PERIOD
column.comment: The start date of the grace period. This field is relevant only if the PP is at the BAN level and includes minimum requirements.

column.name: REQ_END_GRACE_PERIOD
column.comment: The end date of the grace period. This field is relevant only if the PP is at the BAN level and includes minimum requirements.

column.name: COMMIT_START_DATE
column.comment: Contract start date

column.name: COMMIT_END_DATE
column.comment: Specifies the date until which the customers commitment to the company is valid. If the customer terminates the commitment before it has ended, the customer pays an early termination penalty.

column.name: COMMIT_REASON_CODE
column.comment: Specifies the reason code for commitment declaration or modification.

column.name: COMMIT_ORIG_NO_MONTH
column.comment: Specifies the commitment period in months.

column.name: SUSP_RC_RATE_TYPE
column.comment: This attribute specifies the recurring rate type in cases of suspension.

column.name: CONTRACT_NO
column.comment: The Contract number of the subscriber.

column.name: CNT_SEQ_NO
column.comment: The contract sequence Number. The attribute is populated when a new subscriber record is opened.

column.name: DEALER_CODE
column.comment: Code of Dealer

column.name: ORG_DEALER_CODE
column.comment: Original Dealer who sold the telephone number

column.name: SALES_AGENT
column.comment: The sales agent involved in the sale to the customer (second dealer).

column.name: ORG_SALES_AGENT
column.comment: The original sales agent involved in the sale to the customer. (second dealer). The attribute is populated when a new subscriber record is opened. This attribute is never Updated.

column.name: LEADING_NUMBER
column.comment: The subscriber Leading number.

column.name: PABX_IND
column.comment: For a PABX subscriber, this field contains whether the subscriber is the Telecommunications Company PABX or Another company's PABX. Not used, as external PABXs are not stored as subscribers.

column.name: NEXT_CTN
column.comment: Contains the new Subscriber number to which the current Subscriber number changes in future change request activities.

column.name: NEXT_CTN_CHG_DATE
column.comment: Contains the date on which the current Subscriber number changes in future change request activities.

column.name: PRV_CTN
column.comment: Contains the previous Subscriber number that is changed to the current Subscriber number.

column.name: PRV_CTN_CHG_DATE
column.comment: Contains the previous Subscriber number that is changed to the current Subscriber number.

column.name: NEXT_BAN
column.comment: Contains the new BAN to which the current Subscriber number moves in future Change Request activities.

column.name: NEXT_BAN_MOVE_DATE
column.comment: Contains the date on which the current Subscriber number moves to the new BAN, in future Change Request activities.

column.name: PRV_BAN
column.comment: Contains the date on which the current Subscriber number is moved to the new BAN.

column.name: PRV_BAN_MOVE_DATE
column.comment: Contains the date on which the current Subscriber is moved from the previous BAN.

column.name: SUB_STS_ISSUE_DATE
column.comment: Contains the logical date on which the last activity to affect the subscriber status is performed.

column.name: ACTIVATE_WAIVE_RSN
column.comment: Saves the reason why the activation fee is waived.

column.name: EARLIEST_ACTV_DATE
column.comment: Contains the last date on which the status of the Subscriber is set to 'Active' by any of the following transactions: activate, resume from cancel, move subscriber from BAN to BAN. Some activities, such as Change Price Plan, cannot be backdated to a date earlier than the value in this attribute.  The value is the activity date.

column.name: SUB_ACTV_LOCATION
column.comment: Location of the ACD system. Currently possible versions: "N" = ACD North "NO" = ACD Stahnsdorf "W" = ACD Ratingen "SW" = ACD Stuttgart

column.name: EU_CUST_WATCH_LMT
column.comment: The total credit watch amount required by the customer for the subscriber's number for the cycle, in Euro. N/A

column.name: CUST_WATCH_CURRENCY
column.comment: The currency on which the watch amount is specified. N/A

column.name: CUST_WATCH_DATE
column.comment: The date that MPS informs about a credit watch violation. N/A

column.name: EU_BASIC_WATCH_LMT
column.comment: The basic credit watch amount required by the customer for the subscriber's number, in Euro.

column.name: BASIC_WATCH_CURRENCY
column.comment: The currency on which the basic watch amount is specified.

column.name: SUB_MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Contains the sub-market to which the adjusted charge or message belongs.

column.name: LIMIT_RESERVED_DAYS
column.comment: This field specifies the maximum number of days that a specific CTN can be reserved for a customer.

column.name: FF_EXPIRATION_DATE
column.comment: The latest expiration date from all the F&F members. (for future use)

column.name: FLEX_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether another subscriber has the same SIM-Card (Twin Card indicator).

column.name: DUO_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the SIM card is DuoBill. If so, indicates whether this SIM card is a Master or a Slave.

column.name: LISTED_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the subscriber is listed.

column.name: SUB_DEPARTMENT_CD
column.comment: For business/company subscribers, the department no of the subscriber.

column.name: LAST_SUBS_DISC_DT
column.comment: Date of the last subhandy purchase

column.name: LAST_SUBS_DISC_DT_UD
column.comment: The last time a tree discount was given.

column.name: LAST_SUBSCR_DISC_SN
column.comment: The last date the subscriber receives a discount

column.name: LAST_SUBSCR_DISC_SN_UD
column.comment: The last bill sequence number for the given discount for undo.

column.name: PNI
column.comment: The Private Number Index that the TN belongs. For Future Use. Inserts when a PNI is selected for the subscriber.  Updates when the Subscriber's PNI is changed.

column.name: RMS_REF_STORE_ID
column.comment: First part of the RMS document reference, which identifies the store location.

column.name: RMS_REF_TYPE
column.comment: Second part of the RMS document reference, which indicates whether the reference is to an order or an invoice.  I - Invoice O - Order

column.name: RMS_REF_OD
column.comment: Third part of the RMS document reference, which is a reference number.

column.name: EU_DLR_ACT_FEE
column.comment: The amount the dealer receives from the subscriber for activation, in Euro.

column.name: DLR_ACT_CURRENCY
column.comment: The currency on which the dealer activation fee is specified.

column.name: ORIGINAL_INIT_DATE
column.comment: Launch date

column.name: BONUS_ID
column.comment: Unique identification number

column.name: BONUS_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the subscriber is listed in the BONUS system. N/A

column.name: CONV_RUN_NO
column.comment: Used for conversion.

column.name: CONTRACT_TYPE
column.comment: The contract type associated with the SOC, refers to CONTRACT_TYPE table.

column.name: RESERVE_MODE
column.comment: Indicates whether SIM and MSISDN are specified for a reserved subscriber (strong reservation) or not (weak).

column.name: ORIGINAL_ADDRESS_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether or not the user address is defaulted from the legal address.

column.name: PREPAID_IND
column.comment: Indicates wether the subscriber's BAN has a prepaid (debit) account, credit account or callya roaming account. Valid values are:  Y - prepaid, R - prepaid roaming, N - credit.

column.name: ADVERTISING_IND
column.comment: Indicator that indicates whether the customer information can be passed on to other companies for advertising purposes.

column.name: PERSON_DATA_EVAL_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether to analyse the subscribers' personal data for statistics and management purposes. Default for all subscribers, can be overridden at subscriber level.

column.name: CALL_DATA_EVAL_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether to analyse the subscribers' call data for statistics and management purposes.

column.name: WELCOME_CALL_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether to perform a welcome call for a new SOC with the appropriate feature (e.g., Mailbox).

column.name: INTERNET_SERVI_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether this subscriber is an Internet user.

column.name: QUICK_CHECK_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether this subscriber is eligible for Quick Check service.

column.name: REWARDS_IND
column.comment: Indicates wheather the subscriber participates in the Rewards program.

column.name: LAST_SUBSIDY_DATE
column.comment: Date of the last subhandy purchase

column.name: SUBSIDY_ELIGIBLE_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the subscriber is eligible for a subsidized handset according to the last evaluation performed.

column.name: SPECIAL_SUB_OK_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the subscriber received a special permission to receive a subsidized handset regardless of the evaluation outcome.

column.name: SPECIAL_SUB_OK_DAT
column.comment: Indicates the date on which the subscriber gets special permission to receive a subsidized handset.

column.name: EU_EARLY_TERMN_FEE
column.comment: The fee charged for early termination.

column.name: EARLY_TERM_CURENCY
column.comment: The currency on which the early termination fee is specified.

column.name: HOTLINE_IND
column.comment: Indicator for dunning account

column.name: PAUSE_IND
column.comment: Identifies a paused subscriber. This is a special case of hotlining, initiated by the customer to specify a period during which the cellular phone is not used.

column.name: COND_CODE
column.comment: The Condition code of this subscriber (for skeleton contracts)

column.name: SUB_SEQ_NO
column.comment: A subscriber sequence number, for external systems use. For direct customers it is unique for the BAN, for SP customers it is unique for the MAN. Needed for the interface to the Internet.

column.name: SERVICE_SEQ_NUM
column.comment: Specification of the new serial number of the service for a customer. The SERVICE_SEQ_NUM is not identical to the SUBSCRIBER_SEQ_NUM.

column.name: CTI_VIP_IND
column.comment: Indicates that the subscriber should get a higher priority in the Computer Telephony Integration system.

column.name: GROUP_MASTER_PFX
column.comment: A short prefix to the group master name, part of the group master ID. It is populated only for products of type "Group". For regular subscribers (regardless of whether they belong to a group or not) this field remains null.

column.name: GROUP_MASTER_NUM
column.comment: A unique sequence number per the group master prefix., part the group master ID. It is populated only for products of type "Group". For regular subscribers (regardless if they belong to a group or not) this field remains null.

column.name: FN_CARRIER_CODE
column.comment: The code of the fixed net provider (e.g., DT)

column.name: FN_ORDER_STATUS
column.comment: The last status date of the fixed net service.

column.name: SUBSIDIARY_CODE
column.comment: The code of the cellular company subsidiary to which this subscriber is related .

column.name: EU_AUTO_QUICK_CHK
column.comment: The amount used for auto quick check SMS, in Euro.

column.name: AUTO_QUICK_CHK_CUR
column.comment: The currency on which the auto quick check amount was specified.

column.name: RES_BEF_CRD_EVAL_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether a credit evaluation was performed before the reservation. If it was performed, the activation is possible. If it was not performed,  the deposit charges will be created during the activation.

column.name: FN_SRV_REQ_DATE
column.comment: The requested initiation date of the fixed net service as provided by the customer.

column.name: FN_ORDER_STS_DATE
column.comment: The last status date of the fixed net order / service.

column.name: TARIFF_OPTION
column.comment: TARIFF_OPTION aus KIAS2000

column.name: SP_MATCH_CODE
column.comment: A value which is provided during activation of a service provider subscriber via the online interface. This value is informational only, and used only in interfaces.

column.name: CANCEL_ACT_DT
column.comment: The date on which the activity "cancel subscriber" was entered, for an active or suspended subscriber, regardless of whether an immediate cancellation or a future cancellation is entered.

column.name: ACTIVATION_TO
column.comment: Tariff option when the subscriber was first activated.

column.name: CUSTOMER_ID_VT
column.comment: Uniquely identifies the subscriber in the automotive company.

column.name: VIN
column.comment: Vehicle Identification number.

column.name: REACTIVATION_STS
column.comment: Reactivation status. This field is populated when the subscriber is moved from BAN to BAN or if he is a candidate for moving.

column.name: REACTIV_STS_DATE
column.comment: The last reactivation status date.

column.name: EU_REQ_DEPOSIT_AMT
column.comment: This field includes the required deposit amount for the Subscriber.

column.name: REPLENISH_IND
column.comment: Indicates if replenishment of a prepaid subscriber is allowed.

column.name: IDENT_FOR_CUST
column.comment: An identifier of a subscriber that should appear on the subscriber bills.

column.name: OEM_VOID
column.comment: The ID of the OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) that sold the equipment to the subscriber.

column.name: SALES_REPR_NAME
column.comment: This field will hold the Sales Representative Name entered by the shop assistant during the Porting/Future dated Order registration.

column.name: LEGIT_PIN
column.comment: Legitimaton PIN (acceptable values: 0190-0900)

column.name: PIN_BARR_STS
column.comment: Status of the PIN Barring

column.name: PIN_REQ_DATE
column.comment: Date when the PIN was requested by the subscriber.

column.name: PIN_BARR_DATE
column.comment: Date when the PIN was barred.

column.name: APPLICATION_CLASS
column.comment: Application class of the participant

column.name: SEGMENT_CD
column.comment: Segment code.

column.name: CRM_TEAM
column.comment: Team number in the data

column.name: CRM_LOCATION
column.comment: Location / branch in the data

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: DUO_NO_CHRG_TRANSFER
column.comment:
The field indicates that charges from calls with the asterisk performed by Duo Master subscriber should not be transferred to Duo Slave subscriber. - Y - the charge should not be transferred
N or NULL - the charge should be transferred

column.name: VPN_GROUP_MEMBER_ID
column.comment: The unique ID for a whole lifecycle of a group member.

column.name: TARIFF_OPTION_CHANGE_COUNT
column.comment: Number of Tariff Option changes done for the subscriber.

column.name: DWH_NEEDS_BASED_SEGMENT_ID
column.comment: DWH Needs Based Segment ID

column.name: ALLOW_EARLY_OUTPORT
column.comment: A subscriber having this indicator set to Y will be allowed to outport his FNN numbers before the contract period is over.

column.name: SH_BUNDLE_IND
column.comment: Indicates that the tariff option assigned to the subscriber is marked as SB relevant in TARIFF_OPTION table

column.name: SH_BUNDLE_IND_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date when the SH_BUNDLE_IND was set

column.name: ONE_GROUP_ID
column.comment: One-Group-ID of the subscriber

column.name: AO_HANDLE_IND
column.comment: Determines if the subscriber is handled mainly by the ordering application or completely in KIAS.

column.name: MNP_OPT_IN_EXP_DATE
column.comment: The Expiration date of the Opt-In request.

column.name: ADV_RC_ELIG_IND
column.comment: It indicates if subscriber is eligible or not.

column.name: ADV_RC_ELIG_UPD_TIME
column.comment: Time when the eligibility fields of the subscriber have been latest updated

column.name: ADV_RC_ELIG_LOSE_DATE
column.comment: Date when the eligibility fields of the subscriber have been latest updated.

column.name: ADV_RC_ELIG_LOSE_CFR
column.comment: The sequence number of the CSM_FUTURE_REQUEST record which determines the eligibility loss.

column.name: ADV_RC_EXC_IND
column.comment: If set on 'Y', the subscriber is not eligible for basic fees in advance.

column.name: UPDATE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: The field holds the date the record was updated.
